TopicTitle: Don't use the letter M for file names

Articles.Content: If you're building stuff in the VAB while you have missions running, you can't use the letter M in your save file name.  If you do, despite the fact that you're typing in a text box, the game will yank you out of the VAB and into the Map room/display very rudely.  Thankfully since last patch you can typically return to the VAB and your creation will be just how you left it (not destroyed or buried under the floor like pre-patch), but still, it'd be nice to be able to name my Munsto City Lander!
I found that not going directly from flight or map to the VAB is a good temporary fix.  I go to KSC first, then to the VAB.  I then have no issues with the "M" key.
